attributes.action: better define the offence to be in charge of a motor vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we wish the law to provide a clearer definition of being being drunk in charge of a vehicle.
e.g. If a person is sitting in a car and obviously not driving and had no intention to drive currently seems to  makes no difference at all.
A more commonsense approach needs to be adopted, if caught in a moving car your gulty, but if the engines is off it and your not intending to move should be not gulty?
